name: Dodgeroids - Dodge Asteroids!
description:
Stay alive as long as possible!
Survive in the dangerous space with your ship dodging asteroids and other enemies that will try to finish with you.

Features:
- Intuitive and comfortable control for mobile devices.
- Minimalistic revision of the classic Asteroids.
- Wide variety of enemies.
- Customizable graphics.
- Diverse color palettes.
- Quiet music, ideal for playing.
- Game for the whole family.

Inspired by Atari's Asteroids.
Inspired by Toby Fox Undertale.
